text: ariyuka: akasabhumikalilullateakkeyum allahuvinretan. ninnal entu nilapatanetukkunnatenn avanu nannayariyam. avankalekk ellavarum tiriccucellunna nalinekkuriccum avan nannayariyunnu. appeal avar pravartticcukeantirunnatinepparri avan avarkk vivariccukeatukkum. allahu sakala sangatikalum nannayariyunnavanan
